message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm really interested in purchasing the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is below my minimum.  To make this work, I could come down to $1,400,000. This is a fair offer considering the value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,400,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1,300,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
